title: You Are The SunZeit of My Geist 6/30: Bill Cosby, Donald Rumsfeld, NBA, Heatwave, Jaws, Shohei Ohtani
itunes:title: You Are The SunZeit of My Geist 6/30: Bill Cosby, Donald Rumsfeld, NBA, Heatwave, Jaws, Shohei Ohtani
description:
In this edition of You Are The SunZeit of My Geist, Jack and Miles discuss Bill Cosby being released from prison, the passing of one of history's greatest war criminals Donald "Rummy" Rumsfeld, NBA news, the New York power grid alert, the scariest scene never to appear in a 'Jaws' movie, and Shohei Ohtani basically doing the impossible

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
